text: Wa La Tankihu Al-Mushrikati Hatta Yu'uminna Wa La'amatun Mu'uminatun Khayrun Min Mushrikatin Wa Law 'A`jabatkum Wa La Tunkihu Al-Mushrikina Hatta Yu'uminu Wa La`abdun Mu'uminun Khayrun Min Mushrikin Wa Law 'A`jabakum 'Ula'ika Yad`una 'Ila An-Nari Wa Allahu Yad`u 'Ila Al-Jannati Wa Al-Maghfirati Bi'idhnihi Wa Yubayyinu 'Ayatihi Lilnnasi La`allahum Yatadhakkaruna
